mapper.select: SELECT reply_id AS replyId, review_id AS reviewId, user_id AS userId, content, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM review_replies WHERE review_id = #{reviewId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_replies ( review_id, user_id, content, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{reviewId}, #{userId}, #{content}, NOW(), NULL )
mapper.update: UPDATE review_replies SET content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE reply_id = #{replyId}
